Uses of Package
cams.camp

Packages that use cams.camp
Package
Description
cams.camp
A group of classes making up the entity and controller for camp.
cams.domain
A group consisting of staff and student-related classes, which represents the User domain of the application.
cams.filter
A group of classes consisting of the filtering logic used by CampFilterController.
cams.repliable
A group of classes making up the entity and editor of repliables (suggestion and enquiry).
cams.serializer
A group of classes responsible for serializing and deserializing .xlsx files.
cams.user
A group of consisting of User and the control classes UserController, which stores all users, and AuthController which facilitates User login, logout and change password.
cams.view.components.camp
A group of user interface components specific to the camp functionality.
  • Classes in cams.camp used by cams.camp
    Class
    Description
    Camp
    Main entity class representing a camp.
    CampController
    The CampController class manages camps and provides functionality for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting camps.
    CampDate
    Represents the date-related information for a camp, including start date, end date, and registration deadline.
    CampInfo
    The CampInfo class represents information about a camp, including its name, location, description, total slots, committee slots, and visibility status.
